Content: Indian super star Suresh Raina has married with his fiance Priyanka at a private ceremony which was attended by his family members, team-mates and close friends at The Leela Palace Hotel in New Delhi on Friday April 3. Raina and Priyanka have been friends since their childhood. It is also learnt that their families have close association. It is also a known fact that his mom chose her for him. The function was attended by fellow cricketers of the Indian team and the Chennai Super Kings including MS Dhoni, N Srinivasan and Dwayne Bravo.
